thread.title: Migos’ Culture Is the No. 1 Album in America
thread.title_full: Migos’ Culture Is the No. 1 Album in America

author: Noah Yoo
title: Migos’ Culture Is the No. 1 Album in America
text:
Migos’ Culture Is the No. 1 Album in America The trio’s second studio album is their first chart topper Migos Photo by Kevin Mazur/Getty Images for Philymack 
Migos have the No. 1 album in America, Billboard reports . Culture sold 131,000 equivalent album units in the first week of its release (with 77,000 of those stemming from streaming). It marks the first No. 1 for Migos, who previously peaked at No. 17 with 2015’s Yung Rich Nation . Migos’ song “Bad and Boujee,” featuring Lil Uzi Vert, hit the top of the Billboard 100 earlier this year. 
Watch Migos perform at Pitchfork’s SXSW party in 2015: Artists In This Story
